summary: Did you know that, when you buy an airline ticket, the ticket can include a fee to help airports build new facilities and fund other capital development projects? That Passenger Facility Charge fee is part of the “taxes and other charges” that are added to the airline ticket price right before you pay. Airlines collect these fees as part of the airline ticket price and...
title: Airport Funding: Alternative Methods for Collecting Airports' Passenger Facility Charges and Implementation Factors to Consider
